thread.title: Admit It, Brendon Urie Is The Sexiest Man Alive
thread.title_full: Admit It, Brendon Urie Is The Sexiest Man Alive

author: Pablo Valdivia, Farrah Penn
title: Admit It, Brendon Urie Is The Sexiest Man Alive

organizations.name: getty images astrid stawiarz / getty images

text:
View this image ›
Twitter: @taliblipakize ID: 10300201 2. Like your band tees, straightener, skinny jeans… View this image ›
Twitter: @TheCoolestGuyUK ID: 10300247 3. …and BRENDON FUCKING URIE. View this image ›
Gareth Cattermole / Getty Images ID: 10300248 4. From Panic! At The Disco fame, Brendon was, and continues to be, the reason the ~panic~ in your pants never dies. Ethan Miller / Getty Images
Astrid Stawiarz / Getty Images
 ID: 10300783 5. He was a fresh-faced cutie when he first entered our sad, emo hearts… View this image ›
Kevin Winter / Getty Images ID: 10300819 6. …and has since gone on to become the reason none of us can sleep at night. View this image ›
brendonurie / Via instagram.com ID: 10300851 7. You just can’t deny this preciousness! View this image ›
David Becker / Getty Images ID: 10300936 8. View this image ›
David Becker / Getty Images ID: 10301731 9. He has a knack for cleaning up quite nicely… View this image ›
Victor Boyko / Getty Images ID: 10301850 10. …and then, thankfully, taking it A off. View this image ›
Fueled by Ramen ID: 10300960 11. Here’s how adorable he looks when he wakes up. View this image ›
brendonurie / Via instagram.com ID: 10301305 12. And here’s what he looks like when he….well…use your imagination. View this image ›
Frazer Harrison / Getty Images ID: 10301290 13. View this image ›
brendonurie / Via instagram.com ID: 10301998 14. Anyway, here he is delighting us all with his sexy as hell smile. View this image ›
Astrid Stawiarz / Getty Images ID: 10301970 15. AND HERE HE IS SHOWING IT *ALL* OFF. View this image ›
Frazer Harrison / Getty Images Can we see your Urie or nah?
ID: 10301259 16. Brendon also has the amazing knack for looking classy AF while playing a moody piano piece. View this image ›
Kevin Winter / Via Getty Images ID: 10302057 17. And this is what it would be like to be #blessed to wake up next to his near perfect features. View this image ›
brendonurie / Via instagram.com ID: 10302075 18. Sin all over our tragedy, Brendon. View this image ›
Robin Marchant / Getty Images ID: 10301896 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
